meta_description: Home to The Spirit of Competition
admission_text:
*   * 

# 2026 General Admission Tickets

By **Simeone Foundation Automotive Museum**

Follow

Simeone Foundation Automotive Museum

## Overview

General Admission to the Simeone Foundation Automotive Museum. Valid for any future General Admission entry. No expiration. Closed Mondays.

## Our museum hours are

****MON:**** CLOSED, ****TUE to FRI:**** 10 - 6 pm, ****SAT and SUN:************ 10 - 4 pm.

_****We request that all last entries be made 90 minutes prior to scheduled close.****_

## ****Please read important ticket information below****

  * ****This ticket does not expire. It will never expire. There is no expiration.****
  * ****Any purchased ticket (or previously purchased ticket) is valid for any General Admission date, regardless of the date/year purchased.****
  * ****This ticket will grant one person admission for entry to the museum for any General Admission,************[****Demo Day****](https://simeonemuseum.org/demo-days/ "https://simeonemuseum.org/demo-days/")****, Limited Exhibition, or Special Event unless otherwise noted.****
  * ****The museum is never sold out and offers free parking daily.****

### ****This ticket is NOT valid for the following events****

  * ****The 2026 Simeone 12 Hours of Sebring****
  * ****The 2026 24 Heures du Simeone****
  * ****The 2026 Spirit of Competition Award****

### Holiday Closings

The Simeone Museum is closed

  * EVERY Monday
  * Easter Sunday
  * The 4th of July
  * Thanksgiving
  * Christmas Eve
  * Christmas D...
